title: Emotion Recognition in Text Dialogue Data
description: Training ML model to classify emotion in utterance. I leveraged the context of a dialogue and speakers to enrich the data representation, and implmented techniques to efficiently train the model.

title: Joli: Full-Stack Ecommerce Website
description: A simpler copy of Amazon. Users can register/login, add/remove items from cart, order via paypal, and track order. While admin has dashboard that tracks order and visualize monthly sales.

title: JPG/PNG Files to PDF Converter
description:
Streamline application that can convert 300 or more JPG/PNG files into 1 PDF, making images into portable file and saves cost by not buying paid services.

(No plans of publishing the source code)
